name: RuneBoard - VTT for RUNE
description:
RuneBoard is a virtual tabletop play aid for the RUNE solo Souls-like RPG by Spencer Campbell (GilaRPGs). Built from the ground up with RUNE combat in mind, RuneBoard provides a set of useful, freeform features designed to help your fights run smoothly, including:

  • Grid-based movement
  • Health tracking
  • Automatic action rolls
  • Unit and grid recoloring for marking different enemy and terrain types
  • Board state history, to revert to previous turns and undo mistakes

RuneBoard was a submission for the RUNE Jam. Be sure to check out all of the other submissions, too!

RuneBoard is free, but if you found it useful, consider leaving a donation or checking out my other products! Also let me know of any errors you encounter or features you'd like to see added. If people are using the tool and want to see it expanded, I'll work on it!

This product was created for the RUNE RPG by Gila RPGs. This product is not affiliated with Gila RPGs, or Spencer Campbell, in any way.
